Plot: It is a stunningly eventful day in the life of Eric Packer, a multi-billionaire who has recently married the heiress of a vast European fortune. A violent protest is being staged by anti-globalist groups and Eric fears that he may be a target. He is very much the target - but not by the protestors.
Characters: Eric Packer, Elise Shifrin, Benno Levin, Torval
Setting: New York City, New York (United States), Manhattan, New York City, New York (United States)
